Item.name: Adrenaline Pills
Item.description: Grants a movement bonus, but hurts the user a bit.

Item.name: Ascender Pills
Item.description: Grants Lucid status for 4 rounds but drains 7 energy.

Item.name: Shahi Ladoo
Item.description: Restores a large amount of health and energy.

Item.name: Medicated Bandages
Item.description: Bandages with a soothing poultice that restores extra health.

Item.name: Caffeine Pills
Item.description: Cures Slowed, Immobilized statuses; boosts dodge.

Item.name: Eye Drops
Item.description: Cures Blinded status, restores health and boosts accuracy.

Item.name: Regenerator Pills
Item.description: Grants Regenerating status (10% health recovery for 5 rounds).

Item.name: Wine
Item.description: Boosts physical res.; hurts dodge, accuracy, and psy.

Item.name: Expert Battle Primer
Item.description: Teaches all, no matter their level.

Item.name: Cheap Novel
Item.description: A poorly bound book that improves the reader's mood.

Item.name: Novel
Item.description: A well-told tale that improves the reader's mood.

Item.name: Book of Power
Item.description: Unlock one's potential: instantly promote to an advanced class.

Item.name: Motivational Speaking For Beginners
Item.description: Learn how to Motivate others in this best-selling book!

Item.name: Self Defense and You
Item.description: Tired of feeling helpless? Learn Guard Stance and fight back!

Item.name: Don't Make the First Move
Item.description: Make moving second work for you: learn the power of Nimble Stance!

Item.name: Shield Pray Love
Item.description: I thought I had everything...but then I learned Mind Shield!

Item.name: Walking But Faster: A Primer on Sprinting
Item.loadID: Walking But Faster: A Primer on Sprinting
Item.description: Get places quicker: learn the secrets of Sprint within!

Item.name: Cooking: From Mediocre to Master
Item.description: Learn how to cook delicious meals your friends will appreciate!

Item.name: Bambi Must Pay: A Guide to Hunting
Item.loadID: Bambi Must Pay: A Guide to Hunting
Item.description: Learn how to hunt--show all that lousy wildlife who's boss!

Item.name: Quiet Mind: Focus Under Stress
Item.description: Learn to double energy regen from resting in battle or your money back!

Item.name: Powerful Pyro Blasts
Item.description: Learn to knock targets backwards with your Pyro Blast, guaranteed!

Item.name: Concussive Cryo Blasts
Item.description: Learn to knock targets backwards with your Cryo Blast, guaranteed!

Item.name: Leveling Light Blasts
Item.description: Learn to knock targets backwards with your Light Blast, guaranteed!

Item.name: Staggering Shadow Blasts
Item.description: Learn to knock targets backwards with your Shadow Blast, guaranteed!

Item.name: How to Make Enemies and Influence People
Item.loadID: How to Make Enemies and Influence People
Item.description: Achieve a base 100% success rate with Mind Control and make your dreams come true!

Item.name: The Self-Sustaining Mentalist
Item.description: Learn to counterattack with Feedback and boost your survivability!

Item.name: The Avenging Arbalist
Item.description: Learn the art of speed-reloading; counterattack with Crossbow!

Item.name: Arrowing Around Armor
Item.description: Learn bow techniques to avoid 33% of armor, every time!

Item.name: Swifter Sword: Triple Strikes and More
Item.loadID: Swifter Sword: Triple Strikes and More
Item.runsScripts: SpawnFloatingText,Message,Turn now continues after Double Strike!
Item.description: Double Strike not enough? Learn to keep acting afterwards!

Item.name: Gust with Gusto!
Item.runsScripts: SpawnFloatingText,Message,Turn now continues after Kinetic Gust!
Item.description: Learn to keep acting after using Kinetic Gust!

Item.name: Dive and Ditch: A Swooper's Guide
Item.loadID: Dive and Ditch: A Swooper's Guide
Item.description: Learn to keep moving after your Dive and retreat to safety!

Item.name: Salubrious Draught
Item.description: Rumored to instill good health. Permanently boosts maximum health by 3.

Item.name: Protein Pellets
Item.description: A huge dose of protein. Permanently boosts strength by 1.

Item.name: Mycelium Drops
Item.description: Has a reputation for mind expansion. Permanently boosts psy by 1.

Item.name: Anatomical Treatise
Item.description: Find better bodily locations to target. Permanently boosts accuracy by 10.

Item.name: Repair Kit
Item.description: Restore 20 uses to the currently equipped, non-broken weapon.

Item.name: Counterweight
Item.description: Permanently adds +10 accuracy to the currently equipped weapon.

Item.name: Poison Sheath
Item.description: Currently equipped weapon gains +1 Poison damage and a chance of causing Poisoned status.

Item.name: Oil-filled Sheath
Item.description: Currently equipped weapon gains +1 Heat damage and a chance of causing Burning status.

Item.name: Reinforcing Spine
Item.description: Permanently adds +5 maximum uses to the currently equipped weapon.

Item.name: Whetstone
Item.description: Permanently adds +1 strength to the currently equipped weapon.

Item.name: Fangiss Ka
Item.description: Silithis's prized mace. Requires grandmace mastery.

Item.name: Krodh
Item.description: Prince Ajit's personal gada. Mace knockback +1. Requires grandmace mastery.

Item.name: Steam Crossbow
Item.description: Vibra-powered crossbow. Ignores resistances when imposing status effects.

Item.name: Weighted Net
Item.description: A weighted net for temporarily trapping combatants.

Item.name: Iron Claw
Item.description: Gauntlets that make a spriggat's claws deadlier.

Item.name: Steel Claw
Item.description: Gauntlets that make a spriggat's claws deadlier.

Item.name: Jwalaa
Item.description: A rapier wreathed in flame. +4 Heat dmg, causes Burning.

Item.name: Insulated Full Plate
Item.statPlus: Pierce Res.,50/Slash Res.,60/Crush Res.,10/Heat Res.,25/Cold Res.,25

Item.name: GEN:Small Shield
Item.description: A small shield. Boosts maximum health.

Item.name: GEN:Kite Shield
Item.description: A great shield; grants Defensive Stance.

Item.name: Wood Small Shield
Item.description: A small shield. Boosts maximum health.

Item.name: Iron Small Shield
Item.description: A small shield. Boosts maximum health.

Item.name: Kite Shield
Item.description: A great shield. Boosts maximum health, grants Defensive Stance.

Item.name: Fur-Lined Cloak
Item.description: Partial protection from Cold. Requires light armor mastery.

Item.name: Ajit's Turban
Item.description: Grants huge Accuracy boost, immunity to Enthralled and Stunned.

Item.name: Light Plating
Item.description: Boosts physical resistances somewhat for golems.

Item.name: Armored Plating
Item.description: Boosts physical resistances significantly for golems.

Item.name: Solar Module
Item.description: For golems: regain +1 energy each turn.

Item.name: Lockpicks
Item.description: Grants Unlock Door, Pilfer (destroys locked chests).

Item.name: Master Lockpicks
Item.description: +2 Reflexes; grants Unlock Door, Pilfer (destroys locked chests). Unbreakable.

Item.name: Bracing Gloves
Item.description: Grants Shove. Physical fighters and light armor users only.

Item.name: Torch
Item.description: See 5 squares further through fog of war.

Item.name: Steamthopter
Item.description: Gain ability to fly once per turn.

Item.name: Grapple Chain
Item.description: Gain ability to grapple and pull characters.

Item.name: Pocket Sand
Item.description: Equip to let the user throw extra-fine sand in the eyes of an opponent.

Item.name: Snare Kit
Item.description: Equip to let the user place snare traps.

Item.name: Satchel Charge
Item.description: Equip to let the user place a charge that explodes in 2 rounds.

Item.name: Drawing
Item.description: A beautiful sketch rendered in charcoal.

Item.name: Figurine
Item.description: A detailed figurine carved out of wood.

Item.name: Doll
Item.description: An elaborate painted wooden toy with movable limbs.

Item.name: Strangely Cut Gem
Item.description: A gem with an unusual shape.

Item.name: Custom Throwing Knives
Item.description: Set of throwing knives, well fit for the off hand.

Item.name: Blessing of Frost
Item.description: This character is blessed by the Lantern of Frost, and can use Cryokinetics.

Item.description: A gently glowing lantern, eminating an unsettling cold.
